title: Dhacdooyinka & Sheegitaanka - Macbadka Orbital
heading: Dhacdooyinka & Sheegashada
description: Farshaxan sanado badan ah waa qayb ka mid ah 13-kii Mercosul Bienal ee Porto Alegre, Brazil, oo uu sameeyay Marcelo Dantas. Waxaa lagu daray liiska dheer ee Lumen Prize 2022 - Abaalmarinta Mustaqbalka. Waxa kale oo ay ku guulaysatay Qaybta ArtSat ee tartanka CubeDesign 2021, oo uu dallacsiiyay Machadka Cilmi-baarista Hawada Brazil (INPE).
